snippet: The New York Times political unit will be live-blogging the first televised debate between the two leading candidates for mayor, Bill de Blasio and Joseph J. Lhota.
abstract: The New York Times political unit will be live-blogging the first televised debate between the two leading candidates for mayor, Bill de Blasio and Joseph J. Lhota.

headline.kicker: Fact-Checking de Blasio vs. Lhota: Round 1
